markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />envision ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You twirl the staff in three consecutive circles and call for the whispers to speak up. For the next minute, you and all allies within a 30-foot emanation around you can hear your staff's whispers clearly and distinctly, gaining benefit from their advice and mental protection. Whenever you and your affected allies attempt to Recall Knowledge or attempt a saving throw against a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect, you roll twice and take the better result. This is a [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) effect.
name: envision (fortune, mental)
